data: `minecraft:behavior.snacking` allows an entity to stop and interact with select food items that are nearby.

data.Name: items
data.Description: Items that we are interested in snacking on

data.Name: snacking_cooldown
data.Description: The cooldown time in seconds before the mob is able to snack again

data.Name: snacking_cooldown_min
data.Description: The minimum time in seconds before the mob is able to snack again

data.Name: snacking_stop_chance
data.Description: This is the chance that the mob will stop snacking, from 0 to 1
